iti37:2.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
iti37:2.3: Saṃvejanīyesu ṭhānesu saṃvejanena, saṃviggassa ca yoniso padhānena.
iti37:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti.
iti37:5.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
